title: Ep. 819 This Is War
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the strategic battle plan going forward to get Kavanaugh on the Supreme Court. I also address the devastating choices red-state Democrats have to make in the Kavanaugh case.
 
News Picks:
This Gavin Wax piece addresses the lessons learned from the Kavanaugh fight. 
 
Red-state Democrats are facing a nightmare scenario right now.
 
Heidi Heitkamp will lose her Senate seat if she votes no on Kavanaugh. 
 
President Trump’s new trade proposal is a big win for his agenda.
 
What happened to the Uranium One case? 
 
The Keith Ellison case is a disgrace. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
